docs.snippet: French conservative presidential candidate Francois Fillon, who is favorite to win this year's election, will lay out on  Wednesday his proposals to cut immigration to a "strict minimum" through the use of quotas, an aide said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: French conservative presidential candidate Francois Fillon, who is favorite to win this year's election, will lay out on  Wednesday his proposals to cut immigration to a "strict minimum" through the use of quotas, an aide said on Tuesday.

headline.main: French Presidential Candidate Fillon to Propose Immigration Quotas
headline.print_headline: French Presidential Candidate Fillon to Propose Immigration Quotas

docs.snippet: Ford Motor Co on Tuesday confirmed that it would be less profitable in 2017 than last year, even as cross town rival General Motors Co on the same day gave a much more upbeat forecast that surpassed Wall Street expectations....
